description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Pork Steaks With Corn & Kaleslaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ pork,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Corn,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Kale,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Dinner Made Easy,Jan Feb 2020,Peanut free
name: BBQ Pork Steaks With Corn & Kaleslaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cook pork steaks with sweet & smokey BBQ glaze

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Bring steaks to room temperature. Season with salt and pepper.
Cook steaks and corn for 8-12 minutes, turning occasionally, or until steaks are cooked through and corn is charred.
In a large bowl, toss kaleslaw with dressing from the kit. Add tomato to salad, and season with salt and pepper.
Arrange kaleslaw, corn and sliced steak on plates, and scatter over super boost mix from the kit.
